trends: There have been no other sightings in Ningbo

divs: Sighting Details UFO A night in summer 2009, out of curiosity wants to look at the outside so I left opened curtains Suddenly found a UFO above directly in front of the House, it is the dishes, no smoke-emitting below, there is a row of lights flashing light looks a little bright, Overall look a bit small, I watched when you were about to take a camera, UFO flew away
